website_summaries.verdict: Entry-level price point makes this a tempting option for users seeking decent but affordable blankets for overnight guests and colder seasons. May not provide as much insulation on its own, but pairs well with existing bedding.
pros: Lightweight synthetic wool fleece suitable for all seasons
Can also be used as a throw or lap blanket
Dense material resists pilling and loft loss
Amazingly low retail price point for a large blanket
cons: Not quite cool enough for summer
Some users report substantial lint formation

customer_reviews.title: Too good to be true
customer_reviews.text: The price of this blanket was very cheap, but I was swayed by reviews that said it was great. It's not...it's a cheaply made product. The fleece is coarse and begins to pill as soon as you touch it, it's not soft or breathable, nor does it look good. You get what you pay for...if you need a cheap blanket, this one will fit the bill. If you want higher quality you're going to have to resign yourself to pay more.
customer_reviews.author: Shiver

customer_reviews.title: I have nothing bad to say about the blanket
customer_reviews.text: This is a thin "polar-fleece" blanket. It's a thin fleece blanket people. It's not bulky by any means. It's a thin fleece blanket that provides the comfort and offers that fleece gives us. I use this blanket as my bed blanket. I am a warm person. I was looking for a lighter blanket to replace the thick cotton one I had, and this did the job. I use this and this only as my bed sheet or blanket, whatever you want to call it. I have nothing bad to say about the blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Haraldr Pederssøn

customer_reviews.title: after using this blanket for about 10 months, it ...
customer_reviews.text: after using this blanket for about 10 months, it has become unusable. the surface is rough and itchy. not a soft microfiber feel. its abrasive. throwing it away.
customer_reviews.author: Ty S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Blanket!
customer_reviews.text: I received the wrong size and was on my way to returning it. However, it’s such a nice blanket for the price I decided to keep it and use it in another way. I washed it before putting it on the bed just because I wash everything before using it. It washed and dried beautifully. I didn’t even follow the instructions (my bad) and it still came out perfect. No pilling, no lint left in the washer or drier. Granted it’s not been under heavy use so if anything changes I will update this review as needed.
customer_reviews.author: David Battaglia

customer_reviews.title: Warm, nice, durable, and unobviously inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Nice and toasty. But not itchy. There is only so much one can say about a big rectangle of fabric. I've had it a long time and plenty of washes, and it still looks good. Cheap without appearing so. I made the cat mad, she peed on it while stored, so it had unknown time to settle. Nature's Miracle and a couple of washes and there was no odor or stain. It withstood the treatment appearing as nice as ever.
customer_reviews.author: Kentucky J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for out current need.
customer_reviews.text: This is a light in weight blanket, but it provides just the right amount of warmth for me. When I first opened it I was concerned that it wouldn't be warm enough, but it works fine. I sleep with this blanket and a light weight sleeping bag as a comforter. That combination works well. We are in Florida, with cool winter nights. This blanket is just right for our current needs. However, if we were still in the north with the very cold winters and cooler bedrooms, I'm not sure it would provide enough warmth for that usage.
customer_reviews.author: BJ46

customer_reviews.title: Hard, felt-like material
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels more like a hard, dense, felt-like material. Rough to touch. The color was dull grey. Returned mine.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: SO comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is absolutely amazing in terms of softness and comfort. The only thing I would caution people of is that if you have a super staticky house (ours got new carpet so it's f*ing shock city in here) then this will hold quite a charge. Use some fabric softener or an anti-static ball though, and it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Weston Winn

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and cozy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blanket to be a liner of sorts on top of my flat sheet, under the top blankets. It is so soft and cozy - exactly perfect for what I wanted it to do. It is not a heavy blanket, but it is warm and comfortable and adds the perfect amount of an extra warm layer in a cold bedroom. The size is a good queen size. I am extremely pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: V. Spielman

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is on the affordable side and the phrase "you get what you pay for" comes into play here. The blanket is a bit scratchy and is extremely vulnerable to static in the winter. This is probably due to the cold weather affecting the fleece material. However, the blanket is true to its size albeit a bit thin and will not keep you warm in colder temperatures without the aid of other blankets. For the price, the blanket is a bang for its buck but do not expect anything more.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Chen

customer_reviews.title: cheap
customer_reviews.text: Don't know how this got so many great reviews. It may be inexpensive, but it's also that cheap material that balls the first time you use it and leaves so many fibers behind when you wash it that it won't take long until it's half the thickness it was when you bought it. Wish I had paid twice the price for something that will last. BTW, I wanted to return it but would have had to pay 1/3 the cost of the blanket, so I'm stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mccarty

customer_reviews.title: Value A++
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good looking, durable and lightweight blanket for our summer bedding. As a gay couple, we tend to ruin nice bedding with silicone based fluids. Lol. This is cheap, lightweight and looks great. Definitely worth$20. If you're looking for the deal of the century, clearance cashmere throw, keep moving. But it is fine for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Reece

customer_reviews.title: Decent Blanket but...
customer_reviews.text: Blanket is fine but color is not even close to the pictured example. I ordered chocolate brown but what I received is much lighter. Kinda in between the brown and tan.
customer_reviews.author: Luigi

customer_reviews.title: Satin blanket
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that they are soft and large enough to get lost in. I bought these to donate to a friends shelter that she is starting. She was so excited that they were awesome blankets. They would be great for her shelter. It will soon be cold and those blanket will be greatly needed. I was fortunate to be able to find just what i needed in a large quantity at Amazon. The price was reasonable, so I ordered 50.
customer_reviews.author: Trolanda

customer_reviews.title: If you don’t like soft things...
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst blanket I’ve ever felt before. I don’t understand how it has so many high reviews. It feels like plastic. It is not soft AT ALL. I guess it’s crappy because it’s cheap but this is a blanket that I think should be given away to homeless people, not sold for any money even though I’m sure it costs $0.60 to make
customer_reviews.author: KNS

customer_reviews.title: NOT a warm blanket.
customer_reviews.text: Can't understand why others mentioned this is warm. IT IS NOT A FALL/WINTER blanket. i have had this for 2 years before now i write a review. i am starting to question how many of these reviews are fake. this is so sheer that i believe a regular bath towel would provide more warmth. this is more a summer shade than anything. i can feel air easily going thru the material. stitching is falling apart even without any rough handling.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Rox

customer_reviews.title: Worst blanket ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, cannot recommend this blanket - the fabric is very strange and poor, and it arrived full of lint. Had I known how poor this was, I would not have accepted it, even if it were free. Return date is long past - we didn't actually open it until we needed it; and then decided we don't even want to put this as a cargo liner in our car - too much lint floating around, made a mess - much less use this for people.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Winter is coming and I need a good blanket under my comforter to keep me warm
customer_reviews.text: Winter is coming and I need a good blanket under my comforter to keep me warm! Now the weather is not that bad since it is only early oct in Michigan. However , this blanket is not good as described.the material is similar to those you get during air flight. It is thin and cheaply made material.
customer_reviews.author: H.N from Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for a lightweight blanket
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a replacement for an old blanket that had finally just worn out completely. This was the closest I could find to match it. I was pleasantly surprised that the silk edging runs around the entire blanket - the old one just had it at the top. This is a lightweight blanket, not as heavy as the old one, which I like better. The quality is wonderful and it washed and dried beautifully the first time. I expect we will get many uses out of this blanket and I definitely would order another if needed.
customer_reviews.author: cctyger

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality, size, and warmth!!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe that I got this for $20. It hands down is better than blankets many times its price. Large, warm, durable, gets the job done. I picked up one to add a layer to my bed's comforter. I am picking up another for the sofa. Got the blue. A little bright, but actually looks great!
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, but will avoid hot water and hot dryer
customer_reviews.text: Nice color. Isn't shedding so far, but I haven't washed it yet. I need an afghan over the top at night, but my partner says he's plenty warm. It will be perfect when the weather warms up. I think some of these buyers who complain about shedding and losing shape, might consider lowering the water temp when they wash and definitely lower the dryer temp. A lot of heat will most likely damage this blanket, because the texture is thin and mildly fuzzy. I'm pretty sure that's why some buyers have the shedding issues. Turn down the heat, folks...
customer_reviews.author: Carole C.

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, and cuddly blanket you will ever own
customer_reviews.text: This is the most soft, comfortable, and cuddly blanket you will ever own. Because it is light and warm, lots of covers are no longer needed. I find that my sleep is much more relaxing since I started using it. The blanket holds up under washing in delicate cycle very well - just hang it to dry. I have had two Sunbeam electric blankets and both started showing error on the controller after about two months but this one is very well constructed. You can see that the wires have been placed very well throughout the material. This blanket is one of the most favorite things I have bought on Amazon. You will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Happycustomer

customer_reviews.title: I got the king size and love snuggling on the couch with it
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is surprisingly warm. I’ve been struggling through winter and some nights the temps around 20’s-30’s. I got the king size and love snuggling on the couch with it. I also use it with my duvet as an extra layer. Definitely would recommend and worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Adds warmth without being too thick
customer_reviews.text: Received yesterday, washed immediately so we could use it on our bed last night. I bought it to go under a thin quilt we have just to add a layer of warmth without something too thick since it is still summer. It does the job and it will work for fall and winter too. I ordered the queen size since we have a queen bed, but it seems bigger than a queen. It hangs pretty far off the sides of the bed. Also, it is a little overpriced I think just for the fact that it is a very basic blanket, but it was what we needed. Those are the two reasons I have it 4 stars instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: smh06

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, but good quality!
customer_reviews.text: This blanket was exactly what I was looking for. The blanket on our couch was too heavy and it covered everything in fuzz. This one is lightweight and doesn't make a mess. If you are looking for something heavier and cozy, this might not be for you. My favorite part is the size, as it's very big! My only complaint is that it could be a little softer. It's not rough or course, but I wouldn't really consider it to be soft.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Is in just got my first dog who sheds like nonother. In have a big sectional that they ...
customer_reviews.text: Is in just got my first dog who sheds like nonother. In have a big sectional that they don't sell covers for.. So I resorted to twin comforters!!! So glad I did it fits perfectly and doesn't look half bad.. I thought they would be darker Brown though .. They are lighter than in the picture
customer_reviews.author: NCleidomastoid

customer_reviews.title: Lint everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Texture was good. Color was accurate to photos. It held up to a gentle cycle wash and delicate cycle tumble dry fine, though there was quite a bit of lint in the lint trap. I used it for an hour while watching TV, but when I got up my black shirt was all shiny from all of the fibers it left on me. I noticed that there were fibers everywhere, all over me, all over the couch, all over my tablet screen. I've ordered several of Utopia's cotton blankets and loved them, but this fleece one is getting returned.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with a hole
customer_reviews.text: This blanket came with a hole big enough to stick a finger through. Otherwise I would have liked it. The material seems kinda thin and cheap but it was inexpensive so I was expecting that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing and angry
customer_reviews.text: When opening my box to view the items I found a nail inside the blanket package as per pictures attached. Very disappointed on how I receive the item.
customer_reviews.author: Hperez

customer_reviews.title: Color is weird
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two so I could rotate them (i have a dog and need to wash them often). Unfortunately the gray has a bit of a green, or maybe blue, cast. It's still grey but doesn't match my grey ticking sheets. I'll keep the one I already opened and use it as a misc spare blanket but they won't work for my original intention of a "bedspread". I guess I'll return the other abs start looking again.
customer_reviews.author: B. June Steele

customer_reviews.title: Soft, lightweight, warm, yes it is.
customer_reviews.text: Is soft, is extremely warm. We had a similar blanket we bought years ago in Saudi, but we lost somehow last summer. But this one is much warmer. We use these our our couch when we watch the tv, we double them up and get under them together too on the super cold evenings. We bought another color as well and would buy again. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: fortysix

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have hunted for a King-sized blanket for two years and were so excited to find this one. We have looked in so many stores where you would expect to find a king-sized blanket and could not find a simple blanket like this. It is everything we wanted and more. I cannot tell you how much we like this blanket! It is just the right weight and fits our extra-high mattress beautifully. I have not washed it yet, but expect it will be just fine.
customer_reviews.author: jamfromOK

customer_reviews.title: Blanket is So-so
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blanket because people said it is really warm and doesn't pill in the wash. It is warm but the fleece is not as soft as I would like and it did pill when I washed it. I guess I'm not very good at laundering fleece because a lot of the stuff I wash gets unusable (i guess its the dryer that does it) so I like stuff that can handle being dried at medium heat. It's still usable but I'm afraid to dry it again. So kinda disappointed in the blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie R.

customer_reviews.title: Great blanket for bed, very soft and plush!
customer_reviews.text: We use this on our bed and it is very soft and comfortable. It may be a little too warm for the summer but it is perfect for the winter under a comforter. We've washed it about 4 or 5 times so far with no degradation in material or quality so this was a great buy. Way cheaper than retail and it shows up at my door in two days, love it.
customer_reviews.author: iluvdabeer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value
customer_reviews.text: For the price, amazingly good. Light, soft and reasonably warm, also, the king sized blanket was actually king sized!!! It covered our entire bed, not always the case. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: No pills yet
customer_reviews.text: I wash this blanket in a small 6lb capacity washer. It uses water jets instead of mechanical agitation which may be why it doesn't pill and I hang dry it. I bought this blanket because it would fit that washer. It was a good match. I was in a wheelchair at the time and could not easily go to the laundry room. Bottom line, the blanket works great. It wears well. I recommend the washer too. Saved me a bunch or quarters and a lot of laundry trips.
customer_reviews.author: Hereticus

customer_reviews.title: nice general purpose sleeping blanket.
customer_reviews.text: at 50 to 55F in the house I can sleep and feel very comfortable but not hot. I have a softer one that feels great but not as warm. since this blocks a lot of air - but not all I think it keeps you warm enough. it is not that soft, but feels okay. A good value for the price I paid. washed it 1 time and lint level is very low and did well through the wash. I washed per instructions and only the blanket.
customer_reviews.author: diydiy

customer_reviews.title: excellant purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Alright, these blankets are fabulous!! I bought 7 of them. I would call them a mid weight blanket. They almost feel like they have just a tiny tiny bit of wool in them. They are not scratchy like wool, but sort of have that feel. I own rentals and bought them for that, and bought extras because the price is so cheap! I have washed them all and they come out very fluffy and in perfect condition! I almost want to buy more just to have extras on hand! Great price, great blanket! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nellie-- a blind shopper

customer_reviews.title: I got one that was flawed......
customer_reviews.text: I received a blanket that looks like parts of it were overheated and melted a little, just on the very surface of the fibers. I don't know if this is from heat while making it or maybe chemicals. It's not a deal breaker for me, mainly because it's fairly hard to see, unless you look closely and it's fairly small patches. So I am keeping it. But they are very rough patches and even though it was only $13 I expected one without these flaws. Maybe I just got one that slipped by inspection. The next blanket I buy, I will pay more for and hope I get better quality.
customer_reviews.author: ljimbo423

customer_reviews.title: Great blanket, great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a 14 year old microfiber blanket that was finally wearing out after years of abuse by me and the cats. This is everything I hoped for - very warm but light weight, the right size, and very soft just like my old blanket. The cats love it as much as I do. After the initial wash, there was absolutely no lint or fuzz on the blanket, in the washer, or in the drier filter, and no chemical smell. I have high hopes that this will last as long as my old blanket. Recommended, especially at the low price that it's currently sold for.
customer_reviews.author: Eclectic Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Warm Blanket but Sparky
customer_reviews.text: This is a very warm and lightweight blanket but those features come at a price. It is very static. You can actually see and hear the static electricity when you move the blanket when rolling over in bed. At times you can feel it pulling your hair, which is a very strange feeling when you're trying to sleep. At least I hope it's the blanket that's causing that. If I come to find out that we have a ghost residing in our bedroom, I'll bump up this review to 5 stars. Until then, it's a strong 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff D

customer_reviews.title: Love this blanket!
customer_reviews.text: It is a little more course that I thought it would be, but I am in love with this blanket. I don't use comforters because I get too hot at night and this blanket is perfect. I typically keep a sheet under it and it is lightweight (not heavy like a comforter) but keeps me warm enough.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Trammell

customer_reviews.title: How I love this blanket
customer_reviews.text: How I love this blanket! I usually spend the winter freezing to death, shivering uncontrollably under the covers while trying to go to sleep. This winter, we are having lows in the teens and single digits, not too common in my area. I actually wake up too warm with this blanket! I love not having to struggle to get warm enough to go to sleep any more! By all means, do buy this blanket, you will not regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Great Basic Fleece Blanket
customer_reviews.text: Great blanket for the price. Was really annoyed with a fuzzy microfiber blanket that started getting lint all over my apartment. Washed this before using it and it definitely had a lot of lint collected in the dryer but so far it's been otherwise lint free. Not stitched really well but that shouldn't be surprising at this price point. There's definitely more attractive blankets out there but I wanted to be able to sit on my couch without getting fuzz all over myself.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: I love the weight, I love the size, I love the color... but it's still shedding even after 5 or 6 washes! Ugh! Lint is all over the bed, all over the floor and even in our hair when we wake up!
customer_reviews.author: Peace

customer_reviews.title: Scratchy and Rough to the Touch!
customer_reviews.text: You certainly get what you pay for with this blanket. The fabric is very rough and scratchy, it piled almost instantly. It also washes very poorly, while I thought it would help make it softer to the touch, it actually fell apart and now has areas that are extremely thin, almost transparent. I now use it as a dog blanket. Very poorly made--do yourself a favor and invest more money in a better quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Nice Blankets
customer_reviews.text: I have two sofas in my living room that have seen better days. Since the living room is seldom used I didn't want to spend the money on new furniture. I covered them with these blankets, tucked in the excess and they did the trick. I am hurting my arm patting myself on the back for this idea.
customer_reviews.author: Joan, Eureka, CA

customer_reviews.title: Better than I had hoped!
customer_reviews.text: I was hopeful but skeptical if this Polar Fleece blanket would do any better than a down-alternative blanket I had been using. After the 1st night when I awoke, I felt I had the best night's sleep in ages. Smiling, I looked at the comforter and started laughing out loud. The covers showed no sign of any tossing or turning or movement of any kind. Was it the blanket? After a few repeat performances, I think it was!
customer_reviews.author: HatManDo

customer_reviews.title: Great fleecej-thermal blanket.
customer_reviews.text: I love this blanket. Not only do I love it but my senior cat loves it even more. I had to leave it on my bed past spring just for my cat. Here we are entering Florida's hottest month & my cat still demands it staying on the bed. I love it on the days my daughter turns down the AC control temperature. Great blanket for year round at my house!
customer_reviews.author: catsinjax

customer_reviews.title: Its okay
customer_reviews.text: This was okay, the material wasn't very plush like I was expecting. I also want to note that you can't put this in the dryer! Mine slightly melted in a corner because it got too hot in the dryer! This is good for layering between a sheet and a "pretty" blanket to go on top but rather underwhelming on its own. Decent price, kinda scratchy, but it was warm.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: Be aware there is NO satin binding on this blanket. Nor is it as soft as the more expensive fleece. But it is okay for the price. I use this inside a duvet cover so the color, softness, etc., do not matter to me.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Lover

customer_reviews.title: I use it as a bed cover for my pets
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an inexpensive bed cover so that my pets can sleep on my bed during the day without getting fur all over my comforter. Bought this hoping it would work for that purpose and neither I nor my pets are disappointed. When it gets dirty it is easy to wash and it's inexpensive enough that I'm not worried about my pets damaging it as I was with my expensive bedding. Now they can sleep in comfort all day and I can sleep in comfort all night.
customer_reviews.author: Dan the Man

customer_reviews.title: A blanket you will likely use for years to come.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 3 of these blankets from Utopia Bedding in the past year. Two were gifts and one for myself so I can honestly say from experience you won’t go wrong by buying this blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Shopper 62

customer_reviews.title: Real Queen Size Blanket
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredibly soft and true queen sized blanket. I purchased the gray one and it is gray and NOT charcoal gray. It is reasonably priced and I agree with other reviewers that it has a retro look with the shiny edges. Extremely pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: samantha

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice blanket
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is really really nice I was very surprised. I'm going to have to order more before the prices go up and the winter comes LOL. I will purchase again I wish they would have had it in pink or Rose colors.
customer_reviews.author: True Facts

customer_reviews.title: Dirty and shipping issues
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 twin bed blankets. 3 were fantastic. One looks like it had been used. It was dirty and smelled. I am going to wash it and will post whether I’m happy or not. I paid for 4 new blankets not 3 new 1 used. Update - I just put the blankets on my couch and love seat. The colors do not match. It looks like I got two chocolate brown and two tan. As I’ve already washed them I cannot return. But I’m very unhappy since I am using them to cover furniture and now my living room looks miss matched. Can’t you get your shipping process down correct so we get what we ordered
customer_reviews.author: Lynn L

customer_reviews.title: very nice blanket
customer_reviews.text: My husband sleeps without a top sheet, and he really likes this blanket. If it were for me, I would say it could be softer, but he likes it because it doesn't wrap itself around him easily. Haven't washed it yet, so I can't tell you how it washes.
customer_reviews.author: M. OConnell

customer_reviews.title: Color Difference
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't find the size of the blanket on the product information but, in the Q&A someone noted that the size was 95" x 90." Mine was not: it measured 88" x 88." This was disappointing. Also, the color is not navy blue but royal blue. The color difference is insignificant to me but I would have preferred a little larger blanket. Oh, well. I did wash the blanket after receiving it and it seemed to, for a first time wash, seem to come out of the dryer okay -- no pilling or other problems. I hope it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H

customer_reviews.title: Good for insulting your house!
customer_reviews.text: I bought several for the winter to hang up over the windows. Im saving a lot of money on my heating bill this year. Good and cheap way to insulate my home for winter instead of putting up plastic over the windows.
customer_reviews.author: Paradoxically Void

customer_reviews.title: If you have poor cold tolerance it's a good buy
customer_reviews.text: I think this was a great buy for the price. I washed it as soon as the package was delivered. Came out great from the drier. It's soft, thick, and warms just right. My cold tolerance is on the low side (born and raised in the Caribbean 74 degrees is already sweatshirt weather for me). The blue color is a bit brighter than I expected, but since I'm using it for layering in the bed it's Okay.
customer_reviews.author: Ana R Medina Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Not soft velvety fleece at all -☹️
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived on schedule just fine in a zippered bag inside a box. The colors (tan & blue) were just as specified. However, I was very disappointed in this “polar fleece”. I would not describe this as fleece at all. It was very stiff & coarse like an old-fashioned horse blanket. I had ordered 2 & returned them as they were not soft & plush like I had wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Right size, right weight
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2, loved both. Chose to get satin ribbon border and was surprised and pleased to see it went on all 4 sides, not just on head and foot. Queen size fits nicely even on bed with extra foam pad. Quick delivery. Especially recommend this for all of us who one day have winter cold and the next have muggy 70s.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cozy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this blanket in a smaller size for our daughters bed, my husband opened the package and fell in love with the blanket. My husband bundled up with the blanket on the couch, so I immediately ordered one for our bed. The weight of the blanket along with the softness, this is now a family favorite.
customer_reviews.author: funformom

customer_reviews.title: Buy More Than One...
customer_reviews.text: This is the THIRD polar fleece blanket by Utopia (different sizes, different colors) I have bought in the last two months...that speaks volumes, I think,about the superb quality of this blanket. The price is so reasonable; the quality is top notch...it is warm without being "hot"; it is so soft and comfy. And rather than buying a "throw" for the couch, I bought a twin size blanket - great decision! I have spent much more money on blankets which have not have come close to the value and appearance of these Polar Fleece Thermals by Utica!
customer_reviews.author: Ocean State Girl

customer_reviews.title: Very soft making it comfortable, lightweight but very warm, a lot of Blanket for the money..
customer_reviews.text: Blanket is nice and warm especially for it's relatively light weight, which is a good thing.. I have been using my blanket every night since I purchased it, and I really like its softness and warmth, in the winter months, like now but it will work equally as well in all the other months and seasons.. Seems to be of high quality especially for the price, I would recommend to a friend in a heartbeat..
customer_reviews.author: Handgun Hunter.

customer_reviews.title: Just right for a winter's night!!
customer_reviews.text: No purple so I ordered the gray. The color is quite nice - added to the overall snugglabilty (new word!) The blanket is lightweight but oh so warm. I don't like to sleep in a warm room but like to be warm while sleeping. This is just what I needed. It was getting so cold that I could not wait to have it in my bed. I have not washed it yet - will do so this weekend so will do an update after that.
customer_reviews.author: Prayer Lady

customer_reviews.title: Nice blanket at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as a spare blanket. For the 12.99 price I was expecting it to be just fair, but to my surprise it is very nice. I immediately washed it. It came out of the dryer nice and soft and no shedding. If you are looking for a decent blanket at a great price this is the one. We are using it to watch tv at night on the couch, and it certainly is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ross

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is my fifth Utopia Blanket. I bought two twin size and a full/queen size previously. I also bought a king size without sateen edging for my couch. I have washed all but this new king sized blanket multiple times. The sateen is still very nice and the blanket stays soft and cozy!! Will continue to purchase these blankets and would and have recommended them to everyone I know.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Cheap cheap cheap
customer_reviews.text: Feels super cheap like a blanket from a really cheap motel. The “satin” edge is only about an inch wide and is scratchy and not soft at all. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Brian Swisher

customer_reviews.title: Works for a blanket
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a blanket for layering, and dragging around with me when I get sick. It works pretty decent, and it’s got a good texture. Honestly, he cat likes it more, but it’s a good blanket.
customer_reviews.author: April Vandervest

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Warm Blanket
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this Blanket, I needed a very warm Blanket. The Northern part of California can get cold during certain seasons. I wash it as the label instructed a cold wash and machine dry, It still maintain it softness and texture. Most of all it is "very warm" I love all the colors but I pick Tan. I am planning on to purchase another one to have as an extra and also send one to my son. This blanket is an excellent choice warm, comfortable, but yet light weight and wash very well.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy R.

customer_reviews.title: It's warm
customer_reviews.text: I sleep in a really cold room and my normal comforter wasn't cutting it so I wanted something to put in between that wasn't too thick. I wasn't sure if this would provide enough additional warmth but it does. It's quite toasty in fact now. I bought the king size model and it's plenty big for my bed with enough length to tuck in under the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Ian C

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect! My boyfriend likes blankets with a satin edge, so it definitely meets our needs! It's light weight, warm, & soft. We have it between our top sheet and our comforter and we are beyond happy with it! It also came in the mail very quickly! So happy!
customer_reviews.author: KLynn

customer_reviews.title: Soft & warm blanket
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is keeping me warm on this fall night! It washes up nicely, comes out of a cool drying cycle so soft! Nice blanket
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good material and value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I needed a warmer blanket and decided on this one. It's the best blanket and keeps me so warm. I love it and it's worth every penny i spent, I may even buy another one. Definitely good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Color
customer_reviews.text: I gave this blanket the benefit of doubt 1. Because of the price 2. I needed a blanket. It is warm and comfortable. No doubt about that, but the color is inaccurate. I didn’t have time to return it. I really have no complaints. The color is just misleading. That’s no reason to give a bad review. Hopefully the company will see this review and update their images. Instead of taking advantage and misleading more people. Hopefully.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be bigger!
customer_reviews.text: 102X90 inches is the standard size for king blankets. Only problem is if you mattress is over 10" high, this blanket won't tuck in. My mattress is 14inches high. It needs to be 6 to 8 inches wider and 6 inches longer. Not happy with purchase but need a blanket so I won't return it. Just be aware of the size and measure your mattress!
customer_reviews.author: JLB_TX

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a polar-fleece blanket with material similar to the polar-fleece jackets and this was it. Soft and just the weight I wanted. Nice blue color. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Quality blanket. used as a kitty couch cover and ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality blanket. used as a kitty couch cover and it's so soft to sit on. Big enough to cover a large couch and tucked in. It doesn't pull out often either because fleece is low friction.
customer_reviews.author: genegenre

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: A very nice addition to my bed...nice and warm, beautiful color, and a nice size, although I did get a size larger than my mattress. It fits nicely and drapes well toward the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Hudson

customer_reviews.title: FALSE ADVERTISING
customer_reviews.text: Yet another misrepresented bitem on Amazon. This is NOT real "Polar Fleece", which is a registered trademarked of the company Polarfleece. As another reviewer said, I'ts more like a heavy felt. I'm using it as a sofa cover & & it's the perfect size for that. After only a few days on my sofa it's starting to get pills. Will have to see how it holds up and washes.
customer_reviews.author: raffaella

customer_reviews.title: GREAT blanket
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for my son and he LOVES it! Very soft to the touch, not too heavy and keeps you nice and warm without feeling over heated.
customer_reviews.author: Jettagirl

customer_reviews.title: Queen Polar-Fleece Thermal Blanket Grey
customer_reviews.text: I received my packaged on time. The blankets were bigger than looked on amazon. That was a nice surprise. They are very warm, soft, and comfortable. I know people are probably thinkkng why would I need blankets now in the summer right? Well when the temperature drops here in New York my apartment gets cold, so these blankets come in handy. JJ
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Holds up to many washings without pilling.
customer_reviews.text: Our two pups sleep with us and so I need to wash all of our bedding weekly. I have had this blanket since 2018 without any pilling. It continues to wash well and has not thinned from repeated washings. My only complaint is that I wish it were a bit longer for a king size bed but other than that I could not be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: This is a superb blanket
customer_reviews.text: I get cold in the winter with any kind of sheet under me so I thought this year I would try this particular type of blanket and put it over my bottom sheet, and what a world of difference! Very soft not scratchy at all doesn't bunch up at all so it is just the right weight and it has done the trick I am back to being cozy in bed.
customer_reviews.author: pam

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Soft,warm,fits perfect on the bed. No complaints. Washed well. No shrink,no pilling. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Color not accurate - but a good item
customer_reviews.text: Feels soft, definitely will do the job. Using these to cover a sofa to protect from animal hair for from little people losing remotes and toys down in the couch. My only problem is color description. This is not a genuine chocolate brown color as pictured. This is more of a medium brown color and it doesn’t match the couch we covered but it will do the job. I held the blanket against my “chocolate microfiber” couch for comparison of color.
customer_reviews.author: james ford

customer_reviews.title: Finally found the right blanket
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is exactly what I was looking for! I wanted a blanket that I could use year round. I live in South Texas so I don't need something real heavy but I don't want anything too light. This blanket checked off all my boxes. Delivery was timely and cost was perfect for the product. This blanket has quickly become my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Reads 31

customer_reviews.title: Great Blanket!
customer_reviews.text: The Polar Fleece blanket really is a "great little blanket" and you can see and feel the quality the first time you use it. Lightweight, yet built for warmth...this is the only blanket I use on my bed. And NO, I dont have any affilliation with this company at all! I would definitely buy more when and if needed!
customer_reviews.author: Deb Conner

customer_reviews.title: May be required to share
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blanket to keep warm while resting on the couch, but I frequently have to chase my dog out from under it. I don't know what there is about this blanket, besides the comfort that he likes so well, but it's the first blanket he has claimed as his own. I guess I should have bought two.
customer_reviews.author: Jas

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous...just wish it were longer!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful blanket! I've been sleeping much more soundly at night now that I'm warmer. Very light in weight considering the amount of warmth it provides. Nice and soft and snuggly too. The only reason I don't give it five stars is its length. We have an Eastern King bed with a very deep pillow-top mattress, and the blanket is barely long enough to tuck in any at the bottom. Otherwise, solid product and recommended.
customer_reviews.author: R. Petrick

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with the feel of it. I will donate it
customer_reviews.author: Melissa R

customer_reviews.title: Fleece blanket with satin edges
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a new blanket for my queen sized bed WITH satin around the edges and discovered this blanket. It’s wonderful and not a heavy blanket since it’s fleece. It washed up really great and I love it. I highly recommend this blanket!
customer_reviews.author: kkelley68

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: will warm you, but it’s a bit stiff and low quality. not soft like some are. color ok. seems a bit small too. i wish i’d paid more for a different one but i am using it till i have more money, at which point it will go to my pets.
customer_reviews.author: iquanyin

customer_reviews.title: It's a FLEECE Blanket...
customer_reviews.text: Read the description and pay attention! It's a fleece blanket, you're not going to receive the softest thing in the world. I guess I didn't read well and I was expecting some "soft like clouds" blanket like my other ones. Anyways, it's a very warm blanket, it doesn't wrink as much and it doesn't damage the rest of your laundry. I ended up liking it.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. de los Santos

customer_reviews.title: Super warm and comfycomfy
customer_reviews.text: This blanket came out of the wash so soft! It's super warm; maybe even too warm for me since I get so hot when I sleep. My husband was complaining that we keep the thermostat too low at night and this blanket did the trick. I like the gray color but I think it's a little too short. I wasn't able to tuck it in at the bottom and have it touch the headboard. Overall we like and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: Some pro’s some con’s
customer_reviews.text: I like that it’s very warm. It’s very lightweight but I like mine with a little weight to it. I also didn’t like the feel of it between my fingers, but I figured I don’t have to touch it, being between sheets and top blanket. I like the satin like border. Long term, I don’t think it would pass the test
customer_reviews.author: DLopez42

customer_reviews.title: One out of three ain't bad, I suppose
customer_reviews.text: When I read "polar fleece thermal blanket" I expect something thick, soft, and warm. One out of three ain't bad, I suppose. Definitely warm, but not particularly thick or soft. Reasonably comfortable on the skin, but again, not terribly soft. My wife likened it to an army blanket issued to soldiers for use on a cot. Not the image of comfort she was looking for. Overall not bad (quite warm) but not very "couch snuggley."
customer_reviews.author: Greg D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect layering blanket
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my elderly father for his bed to layer and keep him warm in winter. He loves it and says it's warm and soft. I immediately washed it and it kept its shape. It's not cheap fabric it's high quality. Love the satin lining. I am ordering some for my daughters beds for winter.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I use this for in between quilts stays together better then batting .
customer_reviews.author: Rickiann Roush

product_meta.title: Utopia Bedding Fleece Blanket Queen Size Grey Soft Warm Bed Blanket Plush Blanket Microfiber
feature_bullets: EXTRAVAGANT - Luxurious and elegantly designed Polar Fleece blanket is available in queen size measuring 90 by 90 inches and grey color to give a glamorous look to it
DURABILITY - The 2-sided brushed, 100% polyester, polar fleece fabric and 1-inch hem having double needle stitching to make it highly durable and perfect for snuggling
SUPER WARM - Stay warm and cozy all year long with this extra warm fleece blanket which is best for winter camping, backpacking or for use in an air condition room
MULTIPLE USES - Throw this blanket over your bed set when taking a nap, living room’s couch while watching television or when gone out camping for extra warmth
CARE INSTRUCTIONS - Machine wash on cold, tumble dry on low; no shrinkage after washing and drying ensures that it stays the same even after multiple wash cycles

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars7,929 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
